pullrequest.title: Fix use of not initialized static attribute in Light class

content.html:
It seems that the root of this problem is that Entity::isStatic is not initialized in its constructor. I think we should initialize it to false.

diff -r 711376fe8d0d gazebo/physics/Entity.cc
--- a/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc  Thu Jan 21 14:45:27 2016 -0800
+++ b/gazebo/physics/Entity.cc  Thu Jan 28 10:41:40 2016 -0800
@@ -56,6 +56,7 @@
 Entity::Entity(BasePtr _parent)
   : Base(_parent)
 {
+  this->isStatic = false;
   this->isCanonicalLink = false;
   this->node = transport::NodePtr(new transport::Node());
   this->AddType(ENTITY);
